backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report structure containing an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to brief descriptions of each component or utility.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing products, admin mode, UI layout, and the cyber background.
frontend/src/components/AddProductForm.t: Admin form to add products with alphanumeric price validation and image URL input.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessModal: Modal requiring a specific access code to enable admin mode.
frontend/src/components/ChangeNotesPanel: Admin notes panel with localStorage persistence and clipboard copy.
frontend/src/components/CyberVfxBackgrou: Animated cyberâ€‘themed background with grid, scanlines, particles, and glow layers.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with branding, WhatsApp contact link, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: A slide-in menu showing Help/Feedback and Admin Panel options, with backdrop and close controls.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product with buy and admin edit features, supporting inline editing and WhatsApp ordering.
frontend/src/components/TrustSection.tsx: Shows three trust indicators with icons: fast delivery, cash on delivery, and WhatsApp ordering.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product model and exports a static array of initial product entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
A hook that syncs a string state value with localStorage, handling read and write errors safely.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a neon cyber theme with utilities, glow effects, and component styling.
frontend/src/lib/id.ts: Generates unique IDs using crypto.randomUUID or a timestamp-based fallback.
frontend/src/lib/price.ts: Parses numeric prices from mixed input and formats display prices using optional custom text.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Provides helper functions to generate encoded WhatsApp links for product purchases and help messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, requirements, architecture, known issues, and feature list for the minoQ e-commerce site.
